author: bpendleton
msg: I removed that test script as part of DERBY-1909, and all of its tests
were moved into altertable.sql, but I forgot to remove the listing for
the file from derbylang.runall. This change removes it from derbylang.runall.

author: mbaessler
msg: No Jira issue - change layout for system.out.println()

author: aconway
msg: * broker/Reference, tests/ReferenceTest: class representing a reference.

don't assume only one message in progress (could have multiple
vector of append bodies. Construct from Reference.
* broker/CompletionHandler.h: Extracted from BrokerMessage, used for
* broker/ExchangeRegistry.cpp: Moved throw for missing exchanges to
* cpp/tests/start_broker: Increased wait time to 5 secs.
